topic.title: How to Display Short Descriptions in the TOC

body.p: To display the short descriptions from the topics in the TOC we need to make visible the shortdesc element.

In the following samples we will make visible only the short descriptions associated with the chapters. The chapters are level one topics and are marked in the merged DITA document TOC with the attribute is-chapter.

body.note: In case you need all the TOC items short descriptions to be visible, remove the [is-chapter] condition.
